Welcome to Quantum

A super lightweight, static frontend starter kit that's focused on automated web developement

Quantum is built with Bootstrap, Gulp, and Sass

With lots of other super handy plugins for automation, concatenation,
minification, and quicker dev time.

Quantum also features:

Browsersync, hot reloading, Slick carousel, Animate.css and much more.
Everything is built on top of Handlebars.js for easy HTML templating ðŸ”¥

Your Home Page

I see you ran gulp dev, this is your site, seriously. You're ready to go.


The scoop: Quantum is a Bootstrapped, Gulp-powered, Sassified, front end boilerplate that's focused on automated static web development. It comes with Browsersync, hot reloading, Slick carousel, and is all built on top of Handlebars.js for easy HTML templating ðŸ”¥ Check out the README for more info.


Just Added! â€” Animate.css

Animate.css has been added to Quantum for some sweet and easy-to-add CSS3 based animations. See the github/docs for Animate.css here on how to implement.

Here is a simple example.

Footer

Has the Emergence.js data attribute appended to it.
(background color changes when it scrolls 75% into viewport)
Us this cool feature to manipulate styles on elements when they enter the viewport. Or don't, It's totally optional.
For more details and the docs, click here.
